column4: Number of human lives lost per 1 crore population due to extreme weather events
column5: Disaster preparedness score as per Disaster Resilience Index
column6: Percentage of renewable energy out of total installed generating capacity (including allocated shares)
column7: CO2 saved from LED bulbs per 1,000 population (Tonnes)
column8: Disability Adjusted Life Years (DALY) rate  attributable to air pollution (per 1,00,000 population)
